text: vy vidznachyly lideriv Izrayilya pislya Moses? Vony skazaly yikhnʹomu proroku, "Yakshcho vy pryznachayete korolya pryvesty nas, my budemo borotysʹ v im'ya BOHA." Vin skazav, tse vash namir shcho, yakshcho boretʹsya ukhvalyuyetʹsya dlya vas, vy ne budete biy?" Vony skazaly, "Chomu my ne musymo borotysʹ v im'ya BOHA, koly my musymo buly pozbavleni nashykh domivok, ta nashykh ditey?" Dosi, boryuchysʹ buly ukhvaleni dlya nykh, vony prohnaly, krim nechyslennoho. BOH znaye porushnykiv
